column4: i need a player that will not lock up on me. gxine and movie player and mplayer lock up on me so does vlc. can someone help me on why my .avi files lock up on me when i try to play them?
this may help with identifying why all these players lock up on you
when i use dif players i find one i have not used it works but the min i close it same thing as the rest.
how do i do that?
how do i do what u said?
i am goin to send u an uploaded pic
http://picpaste.com/Screenshot_1.png
i was under sound prefrences i changed the output to alc883 analog.
what kind of audio out does your mobo have and what are you using? looks like it thinks you're plugged into "front"
movie player and not sure on the rest but i am using headphones.
next to the clock on the top panel is there a sound volume icon? if so right click it -> Open Volume Control
i mean what kind of hardware "female plugs" does it have
yes and its a HDA Nvidia (alsa mixer)
yes
yes everything worked out fine.
im under sound prefrences i hit test and i hear nothing
try unplugging all your audio equipment (headphones, speakers, everything)
i fixed it.
O
why does that make a dif?
because some mobos have a feature where when you plug headphones into the front-panel audio it mutes the rest of the onboard audio
ah ok well thank you for taking the time and helping me with this.
